text: Finally got my Miami-Dade business license renewed online! The new portal is so much easier than before. Took only 15 minutes!
Been waiting 8 weeks for my food truck permit approval in Miami-Dade. This is costing me thousands in lost revenue. Need this resolved ASAP.
Attended the Miami-Dade small business workshop on digital marketing yesterday. Great speakers and learned so much about social media strategies!
The Miami-Dade County small business grant saved my restaurant after the hurricane. Forever grateful for this program!
Why is the business tax filing process so complicated in Miami-Dade? Spent 3 hours trying to figure out form BTR-1. Need simpler instructions.
Just got matched with a business advisor through Miami-Dade County. She helped me restructure my business plan. This free service is amazing!
Certificate of Use took 6 months to get approved. By that time my lease expired. This delay cost me my storefront location in Kendall.
Miami-Dade's Minority Business Enterprise certification process was straightforward. The staff at the small business development center were super helpful!
Applied for the Miami-Dade small business emergency loan 3 months ago. Still no response. Anyone else experiencing delays?
The entrepreneur boot camp at Miami Dade College was incredible. Learned accounting, marketing, and legal basics. Highly recommend!
Health permit renewal in Miami-Dade used to take days. Now it's done in 24 hours online. Major improvement!
Trying to navigate the zoning approval for my home-based business in Coral Gables. The county website information is confusing and contradictory.
Just received my Miami-Dade County small business grant! $25,000 to expand my catering business. Thank you!
The free financial planning sessions offered by Miami-Dade helped me finally understand my business finances. Game changer!
Business license fees went up 40% this year in Miami-Dade. No warning, no explanation. This is hurting small businesses.
Shoutout to Maria at the Miami-Dade business assistance hotline. She walked me through the entire vendor registration process. Excellent service!
Fire inspection for my new restaurant was scheduled 3 times and cancelled each time. Still waiting after 2 months. Can't open without it.
The Miami-Dade County procurement portal training was excellent. Now I know how to bid on county contracts. Worth attending!
Low-interest loan from Miami-Dade County helped me buy new equipment. Monthly payments are affordable and the process was smooth.
Question about occupational license renewal in Miami-Dade: Do I need to submit tax returns again if nothing changed? The website is unclear.
Just opened my boutique in Wynwood after 6 months of dealing with Miami-Dade permits. The final inspection went smoothly!
Been trying to reach someone at the Miami-Dade building department for 3 days. No answer on phone, no email response. Very frustrating.
The SCORE mentorship program through Miami-Dade County connected me with a retired executive who's helping me scale my business. Priceless!
Miami-Dade business tax portal keeps crashing when I try to submit payment. This is the 4th time this month. Need to fix these tech issues!
Grateful for the Miami-Dade women-owned business certification. It opened doors to contracts I wouldn't have been considered for otherwise.
